select * from system_user t where 1=1
and instr(t.username,#{username})>0
and instr(t.realname,#{realname})>0
and instr(t.mobile,#{mobile})>0
order by t.SYS_UPD_DATE desc nulls last
select u.*, r.id role_id, r.name role_name from system_user u inner join system_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id inner join system_role r on ur.role_id = r.id where u.id = #{id}

select m.code from system_user u inner join system_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id inner join system_role r on r.id = ur.role_id inner join system_role_menu rm on rm.role_id =r.id inner join system_menu m on m.id=rm.menu_id where u.id = #{id} and (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM system_menu sm where sm.parent_id = m.id)=0 group by m.code
